entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Hopewell
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:11 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fundy Park (Alma) 03:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -3.0°C
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -4

Wind: NNE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 9:12 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of ice pellets or flurries early in the morning. Ice pellets mixed with snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:12 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the evening. Rain along the Fundy coast before morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 9:12 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
